name: NGI: What is ITIS Portal
description: The NGI (National Geo-spatial Information) division of DALRRD (Department of Agriculture, Land Reform and Rural Development, South Africa): Information page explaining what the ITIS Portal is. The ITIS Portal is a service from NGI focusing on topographic and geo-spatial information for South Africa.
owner_name: National Geo-spatial Information (NGI), DALRRD, South Africa
